subject: p17704774
Findings: A right-sided chest tube is present with the distal end near the right lung apex. Right central line ends at lower SVC. Innumerable, bilateral, nodular opacities are similar. The size of the pneumothorax at the right lung apex is smaller whereas at the right lower lateral chest wall and at the right lung base is overall unchanged. Spinal hardware device is present at lower thoracic and upper lumbar region. Increase retrocardiac density representing left lower lung volume loss, moderate left and mild right pleural effusions are stable.
